text: Modrovich at the 2017 WonderCon. Ildy Modrovich is an American screenwriter and television showrunner. Her most prominent past credits include CSI: Miami, for which she has written twenty-two episodes, Forever and Californication. Modrovich is currently writing, producing and running the series Lucifer which aired on Fox for the first three seasons and was then picked up by Netflix for a fourth and a fifth season. Modrovich was also the lead singer of the Los Angeles based rock band The Heavy Woolies.https://archive.org/details/iuma- heavy_woolies_the == References == ==External links== * Category:American female singers Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Living people Category:American women television writers Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American women television producers
title: Ildy Modrovich
